document.full_text: president barack obama signed a short-term spending bill on saturday that averted a government shutdown, formalizing a compromise deal with republicans that paves the way for more -- and bigger -- deficit-reduction fights to come.
document.title: budget deal avoids shutdown, fight ahead
lines_and_colors: president barack obama signed a short-term spending bill on saturday that averted a government shutdown, formalizing a compromise deal with republicans that paves the way for more -- and bigger -- deficit-reduction fights to come.
